home.title: Lucky Contract Address
home.description: Lucky Contract Address is a platform for finding and analyzing contract addresses on the Ethereum blockchain.
home.subtitle: A tool to help you deploy smart contracts with specific address patterns across multiple blockchain networks

multiChain.title: Multi-Chain Support
multiChain.description: Deploy contracts on different blockchain networks

luckyAddress.title: Lucky Address Generation
luckyAddress.description: Generate contract addresses matching specific patterns, supporting both hex format and regex matching

smartContract.title: Smart Contract Compilation
smartContract.description: Built-in Solidity compiler with support for multiple versions

step1.title: Write/Compile Contract
step1.description: Input Solidity code or directly input contract bytecode

step2.title: Configure Lucky Number
step2.description: Set desired address pattern and constructor parameters

step3.title: Start Search
step3.description: Parallel computation until finding matching addresses

step4.title: Deploy Contract
step4.description: Select lucky address and execute deployment transaction

label.CheckDescription: Find matching addresses based on the following parameters.
label.DeployContractDescription: Deploy your lucky contract address with the following parameters

tip.LuckyNumber: Write your lucky numbers or regular expressions, one per line.
